data.title: Unit Number
data.definition: This field identifies the unit. The unit number for South Vietnamese units is an arbitrarily assigned number unique for every unit; the numbers for the US and FWMAF units were obtained from the STALA file.

data.title: Year
data.definition: This field identifies the year, e.g., '68'.

data.title: Month
data.definition: This field identifies the month, e.g., '10' represents October.

data.title: Unit Name
data.definition: This field identifies the unit name.

data.title: Province
data.definition: This field identifies the province in which the unit is located. The table for converting province code to province name is used in output.

data.title: UTM QUAD
data.definition: This field contains the two characters -- quadrant identification -- of the UTM coordinate.

data.title: UTM East
data.definition: This field contains the easting values of the UTM coordinate.

data.title: UTM North
data.definition: This field contains the northing values of the UTM coordinate.

data.title: VC Military Region
data.definition: This field identifies the Viet Cong Military Region (VCMR) in which the unit is located. Data for this field is derived from the province in which the unit is reported to be located. Conversion from province to VCMR is as shown in Table 1 Chapter 7.

data.title: Corps Area
data.definition: This field identifies the Corps Tactical Zone in which the unit is located. Data for this field are derived from the province in which the unit is reported to be located. Conversion from province code to corps area is as shown in Table 1.

data.title: Service
data.definition: This field identifies the unit's service.

data.title: Mission Code
data.definition: This field is blank. It is reserved for the mission of the individual battalions.

data.title: Country
data.definition: This field identifies the unit's nationality.

data.title: Unit Type Code
data.definition: Simplified unit type code.

data.title: Control Hq Unit Name
data.definition: This field identifies the unit's tactical control headquarters.

data.title: Station
data.definition: This field identifies the station/base name.

data.title: DIA Unit Number
data.definition: This field is reserved for the DIA identification number for the unit.

data.title: Coordinates
data.definition: This field is reserved for latitude and longitude coordinates.

data.title: Unit Type
data.definition: Unit type code from the STALA file.

data.title: For Future Use
data.definition: This field is reserved for future use.
